location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 11/1 III Muscat Administration Reports and related correspondence'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 50; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-49; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence concerning the Annual Muscat Administration Annual Report for the years 1947-48 and contains a copy of the report.The file features the following principal correspondents: the Political Agent and Consul, Muscat; the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf; the Medical Officer, Muscat; the Director General of Customs, Muscat; the President of the Municipal Council, Muscat; Cable and Wireless Limited; Gray, Mackenzie and Co.There is some correspondence in Arabic, with the President of the Municipal Council, Muscat.

name.namePart: Government of Muscat and Oman, Director-General of Customs
Gray, Mackenzie and Company Limited, shipping agents
